column5: Does anyone know the restrictions for camping on Crown land. Some tell me there are only a few places where you can camp and some tell me that you can go anywhere. From what I have found it looks like you can go anywhere except for a few places that our off limits like nature preserve areas. Can anyone clear this up?

This link should help you out. I assume you were just looking for information regarding camping on crown land, as opposed to a park site. Any questions let me know. http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/MNR/FISHING/crownland.html Agate
